The tissue will be analyzed for factors that are involved in causing pain and others that', 'are involved in promoting tumor growth. The research that may', 'be done is unknown at this time. Storing samples for future studies is called "biobanking". There will also be an ethics review to ensure that', 'the request is necessary and proper.
